SKUInfo.Name: Hair's to a Smooth Summer / Tahitian Noni & Monoi Blow out Kit

Description:
Safely blow out your natural hair while protecting it from heat damage. A nourishing styling cream that reduces friction for easier brush glide during blow drying. Protects hair against damage from heat styling. The lightweight oil glosser instantly adds high shine, without silicone. Apply Scalp Therapy weekly to soothe and hydrate scalp to promote healthy hair renewal and growth.

Bundle Includes:

Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair Blow Out Cream: A nourishing styling cream that reduces friction for easier brush glide during blow drying. Protects hair against damage from heat styling. Certified organic Shea Butter, revitalizing Tahitian Noni and Monoi Oil combine to moisturize, condition and enhance shine. Helps smooth the cuticle layers of the hair to create sleek, smooth styles.

Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair High Shine Glosser : The lightweight oil glosser instantly adds high shine, without silicone. Formulated with certified organic Shea Butter, revitalizing Tahitian Noni and precious Monoi, Argan and Apricot Oils to help strengthen and smooth hair. Helps control frizz for a sleek finish.

Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair Hair & Scalp Weekly Therapy: This ultra-nourishing treatment is the secret to healthy, shiny hair. It works to soothe, hydrate and provide antioxidant benefits to the scalp, which promote healthy hair renewal and growth.
ExtraField7:
• Tahitian Noni: Antioxidant Vitamin C helps maintain hair's health.
  • Monoi Oil: Reparative benefits revive dry, damaged hair.
  • Peptides: Peptides bind to hair, protecting and smoothing each strand.
  • Botanical Extracts: Extracts strengthen and protect hair during heat styling and from environmental stressors.
  • Keratin: Smoothes and reduces flyaways while moisturizing hair.
ExtraField8:
Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair Blow Out Cream: Apply a quarter-sized amount to damp hair from root to ends. Section hair and blow-dry. Style as desired.

Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair High Shine Glosser: Spray product into hands and gently smooth over hair after styling. Repeat if necessary.

Tahitian Noni & Monoi Smooth & Repair Hair & Scalp Weekly Therapy: Apply weekly to wet or dry hair, working through form root to ends. Saturate entire head. Leave on for 20 - 40 minutes. Rinse well. Follow with our Tahitian Noni & Monoi Conditioning Shampoo and Rinse Out Conditioner. Style as desired.
